channel.title: Add transparent BufferedImage over a canvas in JLayeredPane
channel.description: Basically, I have a JLayeredpane and I want to add a trasparent BufferedImage to it, yet the only way that I can think of is adding a Canvas to the top, although these do not seem to support transparency, anyway, any ideas? Thanks in advance

item.title: Add transparent BufferedImage over a canvas in JLayeredPane
item.dc:creator: @diddlewotsit diddlewotsit
item.description:
@diddlewotsit wrote:

item.title: Add transparent BufferedImage over a canvas in JLayeredPane
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

well BufferedImage is an Image, so you can draw it with the graphics context somewhere
also, JComponent supports transparency i think, get yourself an instance of JPanel and call setOpaque(false) or something

Read full topic
